about_the_game:
Trials of The Taker


You've escaped certain death by leaping through a mysterious portal. But, now you're trapped in a strange dungeon full of puzzles that you'll need to solve in order to get home! With any luck, you'll find artifacts along the way that will aid you in your quest.

Each puzzle has been hand crafted for a unique experience. it will take clever thinking and a strong will to make it to the end. This is a dark and difficult dungeon, and there is not much hand holding, so be ready to explore every option and use creative problem solving to succeed.

The Demo


This game demo consists of a full playable level with five unique and challenging puzzles to solve. The full release is still under development with no set release date. If you enjoy the demo and are excited about a full release, please let me know in the comments!

name: Trials Of The Taker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 or AMD R9 Fury Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and Up
  • Processor: i7 or better
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2000 Series or Higher, AMD RX 5000 Series or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
